source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT	DISTINCT
		SourceSystem = CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'Zoomget' ELSE 'Ammex' END,
		SourceDatabase = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_CATALOG),
		SourceSchema = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_SCHEMA),
		SourceObject = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_NAME),
		SourceObjectType = CASE WHEN T.TABLE_TYPE = 'Base Table' THEN 'Table' ELSE T.TABLE_TYPE END,
		IngestRoot = 'ingest',	--'ammex-edw-synase-blob',
		IngestRootPath = CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'zoomget/delta' ELSE 'ammex/delta/' END + T.TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + T.TABLE_NAME,		
		IngestRootPathFileName = T.TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + T.TABLE_NAME,
		SinkSchema = QUOTENAME('Loader'),
		SinkTable =	QUOTENAME('Stage' + CASE WHEN LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC' THEN 'Zoomget' ELSE 'Ammex' END + '_' + T.TABLE_NAME),
		SinkPreCopyScript = 'IF OBJECT_ID(''[Loader].[StageAmmex_' + T.TABLE_NAME + ']'') IS NOT NULL' + CHAR(13) + '   DROP TABLE [Loader].[StageAmmex_' + T.TABLE_NAME + '];',
		IsLoad = 0,
		LoadFrequency = 'Daily',
		LoadDate = GETDATE()

FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T
WHERE T.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DBO'	  
	  AND (LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 5) = 'Ammex'
		   OR LEFT(T.TABLE_NAME, 4) = 'AMEC')
